quoteText:
<li>Third-party companies, service providers or individuals that we employ to process information on our behalf based on our instructions and for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.
For example, we share data with security consultants to help us get better at identifying spam.
Some information we acquire may be collected by third-party providers on our behalf.
title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
